rooms.name: Living and Dining Area
rooms.description: An open-plan space combining living and dining areas that also accommodates the kitchen, ensuring a free flow between these spaces. The design respects Vastu principles by orienting the entrance towards the east and centralizing seating around natural light.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: The primary bedroom on the ground floor located at a corner for privacy and quiet. Windows are oriented to maximize natural light while avoiding direct openings to the west, per Vastu recommendations.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom
rooms.description: A secondary bedroom with a door directly accessible from the living area. Maintains privacy yet is easily accessible.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: A ground floor bathroom serving both bedrooms. Placed near a corner to minimize drafts and ensure privacy.

openings.name: Main Entrance
openings.description: An east-facing entrance in line with Vastu principles, ensuring auspicious energy flow into the house.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: A small entrance used for deliveries and service purposes, positioned away from main living areas to minimize disruptions.

openings.name: Exterior Window
openings.description: Large windows on the east and north facades designed for maximum natural light and ventilation while respecting local climate conditions.

openings.name: Open Balcony
openings.description: An open balcony space adjoining the living area for leisure and ventilation. The design incorporates minimal structural supports to keep costs low while offering a traditional Kerala aesthetic.

rooms.name: Balcony Mezzanine
rooms.description: A small mezzanine area over the open-plan living and kitchen area that doubles as a private study or relaxation zone. It features lightweight partitions to allow flexibility in usage.

rooms.name: Guest Bedroom (Upper)
rooms.description: An additional guest bedroom on the first floor designed for visitors, with direct access to a small balcony for fresh air. It adheres to Vastu principles by avoiding west-facing windows.

rooms.name: Bathroom (Upper)
rooms.description: A private bathroom attached to the guest bedroom on the first floor. It provides a comfortable space and is designed for ease of maintenance.

openings.name: Staircase
openings.description: A compact staircase connecting the ground floor to the first floor. It is centrally located for ease of access and designed with safety railings.

openings.name: Balcony Window
openings.description: Additional windows on the balcony mezzanine to ensure adequate ventilation and natural light, with an emphasis on energy efficiency.

openings.name: Roof Access
openings.description: A roof access point for maintenance purposes and potential future expansion. It is discreetly located to preserve aesthetics.
